dataset_description.Name: EEGManyLabs - Resting State Dataset
Funding: list of str for grants etc
EthicsApprovals: list or str for involved ethics approvals
dataset_description.DatasetDOI: The Digital Object Identifier of the dataset (not the corresponding paper). DOIs SHOULD be expressed as a valid URI; bare DOIs such as 10.0.2.3/dfjj.10 are DEPRECATED.

sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

handedness.Description: handedness of the participant as determined by Edinburgh Handedness Inventory (EHI)

ehi_handedness.LongName: Participant handedness as determined by Edinburgh Handedness Inventory (EHI; original 10 item version)
ehi_handedness.Description: see Oldfield (1971). The assessment and analysis of handedness: The Edinburgh inventory. Neuropsychologia 9(1):97-113

ehi_lq.LongName: Laterality quotient as determined by Edinburgh Handedness Inventory (EHI; original 10 item version)
ehi_lq.Description: see Oldfield (1971). The assessment and analysis of handedness: The Edinburgh inventory. Neuropsychologia 9(1):97-113

bfi_ext.Description: can take values in range [3,15]. Collected using BFI-S Form, see Soto and John (2017). Short and extra-short forms of the Big Five Inventory-2: The BFI-2-S and BFI-2-XS. Journal of Research in Personality, 68:69-81

bfi_agr.Description: can take values in range [3,15]. Collected using BFI-S Form, see Soto and John (2017). Short and extra-short forms of the Big Five Inventory-2: The BFI-2-S and BFI-2-XS. Journal of Research in Personality, 68:69-81

bfi_con.Description: can take values in range [3,15]. Collected using BFI-S Form, see Soto and John (2017). Short and extra-short forms of the Big Five Inventory-2: The BFI-2-S and BFI-2-XS. Journal of Research in Personality, 68:69-81

bfi_neg.Description: can take values in range [3,15]. Collected using BFI-S Form, see Soto and John (2017). Short and extra-short forms of the Big Five Inventory-2: The BFI-2-S and BFI-2-XS. Journal of Research in Personality, 68:69-81

bfi_ope.Description: can take values in range [3,15]. Collected using BFI-S Form, see Soto and John (2017). Short and extra-short forms of the Big Five Inventory-2: The BFI-2-S and BFI-2-XS. Journal of Research in Personality, 68:69-81

bis.LongName: BIS/BAS scales - behavioral inhibition system (BIS) subscale
bis.Description: can take values in range [7-28]. Collected using [tbd] see Carver and White (1994). Behavioral inhibition, behavioral activation, and affective responses to impending reward and punishment: The BIS/BAS scales. Journal of Personality and Social Psychology, 67, 319-333.

bas_drive.LongName: BIS/BAS scales - behavioral approach system (BAS) Drive subscale
bas_drive.Description: can take values in range [4-16]. Collected using [tbd] see Carver and White (1994). Behavioral inhibition, behavioral activation, and affective responses to impending reward and punishment: The BIS/BAS scales. Journal of Personality and Social Psychology, 67, 319-333.

bas_funseek.LongName: BIS/BAS scales - behavioral approach system (BAS) Fun Seeking subscale
bas_funseek.Description: can take values in range [4-16]. Collected using [tbd] see Carver and White (1994). Behavioral inhibition, behavioral activation, and affective responses to impending reward and punishment: The BIS/BAS scales. Journal of Personality and Social Psychology, 67, 319-333.

bas_rewardresponse.LongName: BIS/BAS scales - behavioral approach system (BAS) Reward Responsiveness subscale
bas_rewardresponse.Description: can take values in range [5-20]. Collected using [tbd] see Carver and White (1994). Behavioral inhibition, behavioral activation, and affective responses to impending reward and punishment: The BIS/BAS scales. Journal of Personality and Social Psychology, 67, 319-333.

ces_d.LongName: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale (CES-D)
ces_d.Description: can take values in range [0,60]. Collected using CES-D Form, see Lewinsohn et al (1997). Center for Epidemiological Studies-Depression Scale (CES-D) as a screening instrument for depression among community-residing older adults. Psychology and Aging, 12, 277-287.

stai_t_state.Description: can take values in range [20,80]. Collected using STAI-T Y1 Form, see Spielberger et al (1983). Manual for the State-Trait Anxiety Inventory. Palo Alto, CA: Consulting Psychologists Press.

stai_t_trait.Description: can take values in range [20,80]. Collected using STAI-T Y2 Form, see Spielberger et al (1983). Manual for the State-Trait Anxiety Inventory. Palo Alto, CA: Consulting Psychologists Press.

panas_s_NA.LongName: Positive Negative Affect Schedule (PANAS) - State mood - Negative Affect Subscore
panas_s_NA.Description: can take values in range [6-30]. Collected using PANAS SF, see Thompson (2007). Development and Validation of an Internationally Reliable Short-Form of the Positive and Negative Affect Schedule (PANAS). Journal of Cross-Cultural Psychology, 38(2):227-242

panas_s_PA.LongName: Positive Negative Affect Schedule (PANAS) - State mood - Positive Affect Subscore
panas_s_PA.Description: can take values in range [6-30]. Collected using PANAS SF, see Thompson (2007). Development and Validation of an Internationally Reliable Short-Form of the Positive and Negative Affect Schedule (PANAS). Journal of Cross-Cultural Psychology, 38(2):227-242

kss.Description: can take values in range [1-9]. Collected using [tbd]

Levels.7: sleepy, but no effort to keep awake
Levels.8: sleepy, some effort to keep awake
Levels.9: very sleepy, great effort to keep awake, fighting sleep
